Articles.Content:
You know that feeling when you have finished your last exam. I have that now! I can now forget all that i have learned about physics,maths, history and philosophy until next year. Kerbal Space Program here i come!

Any one else just finished or close to?
Friday is my last exam.

Friday is my last exam.

Good luck!
Next Thursday exams finish for me. Then its a whole lotta nothing.
Mine haven't even begun. *crosses arms and puts on pouty face*
Mine are coming up, then I will have three more sets of final exams to go through! Hurah!
They never end!

Mine are coming in about 1 and a half months.

And they are my middle year exams, not final exams.
Tomorrow is my first:/

Mine are coming in about 1 and a half months.

And they are my middle year exams, not final exams.

Do you live in the southern hemisphere?

Do you live in the southern hemisphere?

Yup! It's winter here!
I still remember I did not have to do my social studies exam due to a teacher strike.
Exams finished... and my grade in science went down 3 or more points...

Exams finished... and my grade in science went down 3 or more points...

Ahh unlucky.

I'm not that lucky. My exams start on Monday (25th of May), and end in the middle of June... I start with applied mechanics, continue with linear algebra, and end with materials science. Many subjects' final grades are based on midterm grades instead of exams.

Edited May 22, 2015 by jmiki8

I finished my high school (college) finals like three and a half months ago. I've got university entrance exams on Monday (University of Helsinki), Tuesday and Wednesday (Aalto University School of Science).

E: I'm also graduating from high school on Friday
Hmm... well, besides the preisdents quiz my history class is getting on Tuesday, my exams are over as well.

Just remember, when you grow up you won't have the luxury of "exams" you'll have "performance reviews" and either you make the cut or you get fired.

Enjoy your "exams" while you still can

Here in New Jersey, the school year doesn't end until mid-late June, and exams tend to be early June.

Still have a month left. I don't know what you guys are talking about finishing exams in the middle of May
My exams will be finally over in tuesday, but instead of my results I will be reading the devnotes
My exams will finish in 60 years. They're testing me real hard...
